data.actual_result: It still shows the option which its changed to and doesn't change and at times also says missing permissions. Gets fixed when we exit that menu.
data.expected_result: The visuals should change and show that I have selected the option.
data.short_description: Channel Notifications settings visuals are bugged when we change a setting and try to change again.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your channel notification settings of any channel - Change to a different notification setting - Try to change the notification settings again without exiting
